mutants.code:
import re

def get_string_length(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    string = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', string)
    string = string.strip()
    count = sum((1 for char in string if char.isalnum()))
    return count

import re

def get_string_length(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string)
    string = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', string)
    string = string.strip()
    count = sum((1 for char in string if char.isalnum()))
    return count

mutants.code:
import re

def get_string_length(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string)
    string = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', string)
    string = string.strip()
    count = sum((-1 for char in string if char.isalnum()))
    return count
